capability.name: Quote Management
capability.definition: This service domain handles the procedure used by traders to obtain and selecting quotes from market makers
capability.role: Quote management handles the process by which a trader obtains quotes from multiple market makers in order to select the bank to execute a trade with. Recent trade prices reported to the exchange can be compared with trade activity for the different quoting banks in order to make the selection
capability.example: A trader obtains quotes from multiple market makers prior to executing an agency trade for a corporate investor customer

key_features.name: Review recent market trade prices for the selected security
key_features.description: Enables review recent market trade prices for the selected security to support this service domain handles the procedure used by traders to obtain and selecting quotes from market makers

key_features.name: Obtain quotes from available market makers in the security
key_features.description: Enables obtain quotes from available market makers in the security to support this service domain handles the procedure used by traders to obtain and selecting quotes from market makers

key_features.name: Review recent trade activity for the market makers as appropriate
key_features.description: Enables review recent trade activity for the market makers as appropriate to support this service domain handles the procedure used by traders to obtain and selecting quotes from market makers

key_features.name: Select preferred market bid offer quote
key_features.description: Enables select preferred market bid offer quote to support this service domain handles the procedure used by traders to obtain and selecting quotes from market makers
